info.name: otvet.mail.ru [dark]
info.description: Dark theme for otvet.mail.ru site. Only recent Firefox and Chromium based browsers are supported. Please send a feedback to point out any not styled parts. Any suggestions are also welcomed. nobody4chat(at)bk(dot)ru
